changeSet.id: Set public id of all specimen types
changeSet.sql: update catissue_permissible_value c inner join catissue_permissible_value p on p.identifier = c.parent_identifier and p.public_id = 'specimen_type' set c.public_id = p.public_id;

changeSet.author: vgaikwad
changeSet.id: Set public id of all specimen types
changeSet.sql: update catissue_permissible_value set public_id = 'specimen_type' where public_id is null and parent_identifier in ( select identifier from catissue_permissible_value where public_id = 'specimen_type' and parent_identifier is null );
